---
title: "Datasets"
---

The following table contains an overview of the datasets used in slides and exercises as well as the source of each data set. You can download the corresponding dataset by clicking on the provided link:

|------------------------|------------------------|------------------------|

| `Advertising` | [ISLR book](https://www.statlearning.com/) |  |

| `click` | [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/ahmedyoussefelhewag/user-interaction-ad-click-behavior-on-a-website) |  |
| `credit` | [ISLR book](https://www.statlearning.com/) |  |
| `datasets` | [readxl](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/readxl/index.html) |  |
| `fertility` | [Introduction to Data Science book](https://rafalab.dfci.harvard.edu/dsbook-part-1/) |  |
| `gm_cm` | [Gapminder](https://www.gapminder.org/data/documentation/gd005/) |  |
